title: Biochemistry and Molecular Biology

vocab.definition: Protein that catalyzes biochemical reactions by lowering activation energy
Sum of all chemical reactions occurring in living organisms
Adenosine triphosphate, universal energy currency of cells
Process of making proteins from amino acids using genetic information
Process breaking down glucose to produce ATP energy

teachingNotes: Focus on fundamental biochemical processes and their importance in life. Connect molecular processes to cellular functions.

truefalse.question: ATP is the universal energy currency of cells.

multiplechoice.question: What is the sum of all chemical reactions in organisms?

fillintheblank.question: The process of making proteins from amino acids is protein ________.

shortanswer.question: What are the main stages of cellular respiration?
